Best from Italy LLC P.O.BOX 190488 Miami Beach FL , Miami FL 33119 map 0 Recommendations We import only the Best Italian products for You: Olive Oil, balsamic vinegar, pasta BFI-BFY Best from Italy Best for You! Italy, a beautiful country full of history and ancient culture, known throughout the world for the artistic quality of its products that stand out in style and elegance. Best from Italy imports only the Best for You, our challange is to import only the Best and original Made in Italy Products in the USA, a Country where a lot of items so said Made in Italy are not really true. Our Slogan is BFI-BFY! Best from Italy Best for You!
We import only the Best Italian products for You: Olive Oil from Lazio Frantoio Gentili since 1820, a high quality Extra Virgin Olive Oil produced for three generations by the Family Gentili: Italian Excellence for You!
Olive Oil from Molise Principe Pignatelli since 1669, Olive Oil from Puglia Frantoio Monterisi since 1943, Olive Oil from Liguria Cipressa Sapori olive oil Balsamic vinegar Asperum IV view all
Good Italia Food Specialties Corp. 350 Fifth Avenue, 59th Floor - 10018 New York, N.Y. , New York NY 10018 map 0 Recommendations importing pasta, olive oil and frozen seafood from Italy in particular from region MARCHE. GOOD ITALIA is a young food company established in NEW YORK at the beginning of 2011 and its"mission"is bringing to the U.S. dinner tables food specialties from Italy in particular from region MARCHE. Its two founders MASSIMILIANO PAOLUCCI and FEDERICA GIULIANI came up with this idea after have experienced living 1 year in the U.S. doing market research. They discovered that the MARCHE their home-region is complete unknown to the U.S. food market and they wanted to change that. The MARCHE is a small region located in the middle of Italy on the east coast, it has the Adriatic sea at its right, Appennini mountains at its left and beautiful hills in between. The MARCHE is famous for its rare breathtaking landscape and for being the home of some very important artists, like the great poet Gi ITALIAN PASTA EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL FROZEN BREADCRUMBED SEAFOOD
Touch of Italy 33A Baltimore Avenue , Rehoboth Beach DE 19971-2156 map 0 Recommendations Touch of Italy is Delaware's only authentic Italian Salumeria and Pasticceria! Touch of Italy in Rehoboth Beach, DE 302.227.1500 A small, but lively Italian Specialty Shop located on beautiful Baltimore Avenue, next to the Blue Moon. Touch of Italy provides the freshest Italian cheeses, cured meats, pastries and a wide variety of Italian specialty imports. Hero Sandwiches on fresh semolina bread are made to order for carry-out service. Sorry, no table service. Cooike Trays and Antipasto Trays made to order. Call ahead to place sandwich orders for quick pick-up. View our Rehoboth Beach menu online at TouchofItaly.com.
Venda Ravioli Inc 265 Atwells Avenue , Providence RI 02903-1584 map 0 Recommendations Fine Gourmet Italian Deli and Grocery Store featuring fine gourmet Italian Food and Pasta, Cheese, Meats, and Gift Baskets. This Italian gourmet shop and caffe, located on Federal Hill in Providence, RI, is very inviting with its sparkling glass counters, striking tin ceiling and visually stunning store displays. The glassed-in, state-of-the-art kitchen with its marble counter offers guests a glimpse of Chef Salvatore Cefaliello and his staff in action. The caffe offers 30 seats inside, 6 at the espresso bar, and 40 outdoors during warm weather.
More than 150 kinds of fresh and frozen pasta -- this is what Venda Ravioli is most famous for, having been in the business of making pasta in the Old World tradition since the 1930s. Jumbo stuffed shells, manicotti, tri-colored egg noodles, tortellini, tortelloni, agnolotti, angel hair and lobster ravioli are just some of the offerings.
Lasagnas-On-Ya 521 E. Holland Ave #10 , Spokane WA 99218 map 0 Recommendations Gourmet Take-n-Bake Lasagnas! We also offer Salad Kits, Artisan Breads and Scrumptious Desserts This is a locally owned, family run business. We have been working to open the business for quite some time now. We offer Gourmet Take-n-Bake Lasagnas! We also offer Salad Kits, Artisan Breads and Scrumptious Desserts
Catapano's Taste Of Italy 1310 Wesley Chapel Rd , Indian Trail NC 28079 map 0 Recommendations Fresh Baked NY Style crusty Italian Bread, Homecooked meals, sauces, soups, Fresh Pastas, Scratch made Pastries, Italian Deli Meats&Cheeses. Please see our website @ www.catapanostasteofitaly.com
Rustico's 21 Essex Way , Essex VT 05452 map 0 Recommendations An Italian Eatery Featuring fresh homemade pasta and flatbreads. Indoor/outdoor seating - fine beers and wines. Located at the Essex Shoppes and Cinema
Rustico's recreates the Italian experience of rich tastes, warm colors, and hospitality in Essex for fresh-food lovers in our community, for families, couples, and groups of friends who are looking for a relaxed dining experience. Additional Info:"An Italian Eatery"Featuring fresh homemade pasta and flatbreads Indoor/outdoor seating - Fine beers and wines Located at the Essex Shoppes&Cinema
The River Cafe Trattoria and Wood Oven Pizza 517 River Drive , Garfield NJ 07026-3219 map 0 Recommendations real wood burning brick Oven Pizza, Italian Restaurant, BYOB, outdoor Seating, catering, private parties! **BYOB **OUTDOOR DINING **
OWNER: SALVATORE MAGGIORE
FOR A MENU GO TO WWW.THERIVERCAFENJ.COM
The River Cafe Trattoria serves real wood-burning brick-oven pizza and fresh Italian favorites in a family-friendly atmosphere. Start dinner with a taste of Tuscany antipasti, a culinary welcoming committee of fresh mozzarella, sopressata, artichokes, roasted peppers, fried eggplant, and Sicilian olives ($12). Inside the fiery brick oven, quattro stagioni pizzas bake and bubble around a mouth-watering compilation of prosciutto, artichokes, mushrooms, and black olives ($15.95 for a 14"pie). A classic margherita hits the fresh-basil spot ($12.95 for a 14"pizza), though fork-holding green thumbs may find their herb fix with the gnocchi al pesto ($13). Glasses of fresh juices ($3.50) or can
